cast: 比利·鲍伯·松顿 Billy Bob Thornton
writer: 比利·鲍伯·松顿 Billy Bob Thornton
director: 乔治·海肯卢珀 George Hickenlooper
this_title: Some Folks Call It a Sling Blade
introduction: A must-see for any lover of the feature length film. A young reporter (Molly Ringwald) comes to a California asylum for the criminally insane to interview Karl Childers (Thornton), an inmate who is about to be released. In a calm and eerie monolgue he explains how he came to kill his mother and his feelings about his actions that continue to haunt him.
chinese_title: Some Folks Call It a Sling Blade
